p: The molecular structures of alkaline polymer electrolyte membranes were characterized by Fourier-transform infrared (FTIR) spectroscopy (NICOLET iS10, Madison, WI, USA) with ATR mode. Freeze-dried samples were ground into pieces and the IR spectra were recorded with a wavenumber resolution of 4 cm −1 in the range of 500–4000 cm −1. Here, air was selected as the background reference.
